ProjectOverview.pageDescription: Overview of project details and associated plans

ProjectsListPage.intro: Manager or create DMSP project or by DMP

errors.errorRetrievingProjects: Something went wrong with retrieving projects. Please try again later.

form.projectTitle: What is the title for the project? (required)
form.projectTitleHelpText: This should be the formal title if you have already applied for funding, as it will be used to find your Project in the Funderâ€™s database. This can be changed later.
form.radioExistingLabel: The project already exists or might exist
form.radioExistingHelpText: We will search for the project and pull in associated information for you to review and edit if possible, otherwise create a brand new project
form.checkboxGroupLabel: This project is mock project for testing, practice, or educational purposes
form.checkboxGroupHelpText: This is a mock project intended solely for testing, practice, or educational purposes. It allows you to create a project and plans, but you will not be able to receive feedback or publish them.
form.checkboxLabel: Yes, set this project to a mock or a test project.
form.checkboxHelpText: If you aim on publishing your DMSP eventually, we recommend leaving this unticked, so you get the full features. All real projects have a draft status you can use for testing.

errors.titleLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
errors.title: Project title is required

ProjectsCreateProjectFunding.title: Do you already have funding for this project?

form.radioFundingLabel: Do you already have funding for this project?
form.radioFundingDescription: If yes, we will try to search for the project and pull in associated information for you to review and edit.
